full_output.summary: B.Tech Student in Computer Science and Engineering at SRMUniversity,Andhra Pradesh. Passionate about deep reinforcement learning and seeking a company where I can utilize my organizational, creative, and project management skills to gain expertise on the companys brands, products and services.

projects.name: Climate Change Monitoring and Analysis
projects.description: Climate Explorer offers real-time climate data using HTML, CSS, Python, Django, and live API integration. The platform includes admin, login, and sign-up pages for secure user experiences. It features an intuitive interface and robust data analysis tools for understanding climate dynamics.

projects.name: Hotel Management System
projects.description: Developed a Hotel Management System using the Django framework with features like user authentication, room booking, billing, and inventory management. Led the design and implementation process, ensuring an optimal user experience. Used Python, HTML/CSS, JavaScript to create a robust solution that met client specifications.

experiences.description: As a research intern, I focused on enhancing drone security with lightweight encryption methods, developing skills in cryptographic algorithms. This experience improved my problem-solving abilities and practical knowledge in cybersecurity for drones.
